channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAI

item.title: CVE-2021-24023|2024-08-03T19:14:10.073Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiai
item.description: An improper input validation in FortiAI v1.4.0 and earlier may allow an authenticated user to gain system shell access via a malicious payload in the "diagnose" command.
